content:
rgrmrts commented on Issue #985:

hi, I started working on https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/issues/2561 and am wondering if this issue is a clone of that? seems like the end goal is the same - getting rid of the dichotomy between imported/local memory for these function calls

alexcrichton commented on Issue #985:

Ah yes looks like this is indeed accidentally a duplicate!
